msg: This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag

author: striker
msg: Fix starvation issue on listening sockets where a short-lived
connection on a rarely-accessed listening socket will cause a
child to hold the accept mutex and block out new connections until
another connection arrives on that rarely-accessed listening socket.
With Apache 2.x there is no performance concern about enabling the
logic for platforms which don't need it, so it is enabled everywhere
Reviewed by:	Jim Jagielski, Justin Erenkrantz

author: madhum
msg: Include another ab.c rev for the backport
